import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Menu from './Menu/Menu' import AddPlayer from './AddPlayer/AddPlayer' import List from './List/List' import RemovePlayer from './RemovePlayer/RemovePlayer' import EditPlayer from './EditPlayer/EditPlayer' import Payment from './Payment/Payment' import StartGame from './StartGame/StartGame' import MakeTeams from './MakeTeams/MakeTeams' import Login from './LoginRegister/Login' import Register from './LoginRegister/Register' import {withRouter, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' class App extends Component { state = { players: [], //Array of added players backdropVisibility: "hidden", //Backdrop visibility property. textOfBackdrop: "", //text of backdrop to put correct text according operation. signedIn: false, isAuth: false, users: [], isRegistered: false } componentDidMount() { var url = 'http://localhost:3000/'; var data = { username: 'example' }; fetch(url, { method: 'POST', // or 'PUT' body: JSON.stringify(data), // data can be `string` or {object}! headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(response => console.log('Success:', JSON.stringify(response))) .catch(error => console.error('Error:', error)); } // -------------------------------Render // function------------------------------------------------------ render() { return (
{/*Route switch for pass to match screen*/} {/*I am pass main state to every component and set state func to update the state continued we need to refactor this with using Redux!!!! */} { if(this.state.isAuth) return this.setState(element)}/> if(this.state.isRegistered) return this.setState(element)} /> else return this.setState(element)}/>}}/> this.state.isAuth ? this.setState(element)}/> : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? this.setState(element)}/> : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? this.setState(element)}/> : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? : this.setState(element)}/>}/> this.state.isAuth ? : this.setState(element)}/>}/>
) } } export default withRouter(App);
